DOC.brief_summary: To compare visual anatomical outcome complication four surgical technique ( 1- scleral buckling , 2- primary vitrectomy without encircle band , 3- primary vitrectomy encircle band , 4- triamcinolone assist vitrectomy ) management pseudophakic aphakic retinal detachment
